channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Valve discontinued the last remaining LCD model of the Steam Deck
item.description: If you still haven't bought into the Steam Deck craze, it'll cost you a little extra to take the plunge now since Valve is only offering OLED models. Valve announced in a note on its Steam Deck page that it's "no longer producing the Steam Deck LCD 256GB model," adding that "once sold out, it will no longer be available." As of this article's publishing, the $399 Steam Deck with LCD and 256 GB of storage, which we ranked as the best gaming handheld for most, is out of stock. Even Valve's refurbished stock of LCD models has been cleared out. The OLED version of the Steam Deck is a worthy upgrad...

item.title: The 10 best white elephant gifts worth fighting over for 2025
item.description: If you have a white elephant gift exchange at work this year or with friends and family, there’s a good chance you’re scrambling right now to find a good gift — or decipher what even makes a good white elephant gift. The possible origins of the term “white elephant” provide one way of looking at it: According to legend, the King of Siam would give a white elephant to courtiers who had upset them. It was a far more devious punishment than simply having them executed. The recipient had no choice but to simply thank the king for such an opulent gift, knowing that they likely could not afford the ...

item.title: The best last-minute Christmas gifts you can grab for under $50
item.description: Holiday shoppers, it's time to finish knocking out that seasonal wish list. At this point, your online purchases may not arrive in time unless you're willing to pay extra for priority shipping - or you happen to get lucky. Still, gifting anything at all is awfully nice of you, regardless of when it arrives. If […]

item.title: Last call! Time's running out to get four free iPhone 17 Pro, Galaxy S25 Plus, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and other excellent deals
item.description: Don't miss Verizon and T-Mobile's big end-of-year sales if you're looking to upgrade your phone – they're likely to end soon.

item.title: Test du HP Victus 15 (2025) : des sacrifices qui ne passent plus
item.description: Si HP Omen a su nous surprendre en bien plus d'une fois, la gamme Victus continue de nous décevoir sur ce Victus 15 de 2025. Voici pourquoi.

item.title: Voici la meilleure montre connectée de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Cette année, la meilleure montre connectée testée par Frandroid est la Google Pixel Watch 4. Elle a ainsi reçu le Frandroid Awards avec Delos pour sa catégorie.

item.title: ‘Man of Tomorrow’ Has Finally Found Its Brainiac
item.description: Give a 'hello' to Lars Eidinger, the man who'll be your Brainiac for 2027's 'Man of Tomorrow.'

item.title: Amazon launches one final Kindle sale to end the year — here are the 7 best deals I'd buy
item.description: Snap up a Kindle ereader from as little as $89.99 / £79.99 in Amazon's final sale before Christmas – here are the 7 best deals.

item.title: Le Dreame L40 Ultra AE à -31 % est plus efficace, plus puissant, plus fin et moins cher que l’aspirateur laveur Dreame L40 Ultra classique
item.description: Avec son aspirateur robot Dreame L40 Ultra AE, la marque nettoie vos sols efficacement à 479 euros sur Boulanger au lieu de 699 euros.

item.title: The LCD Steam Deck is done
item.description: The most affordable Steam Deck, the $399 LCD model, is not available in the US. And, according to the Steam Deck site, it won't be coming back. Underneath the listings for the various models is a note that says: We are no longer producing the Steam Deck LCD 256GB model. Once sold out, it will […]

item.title: Is This Thing On? was 'never' going to be a John Bishop biopic, says creator
item.description: If you're a comedy fan or Brit, Is This Thing On? has hilarious inspiration — but it was 'never' going to be a John Bishop biopic

item.title: The True ‘My Hero Academia’ Finale Arrives Next Year
item.description: Bones has one last episode for 'My Academia' to close out the anime as part of the series' 10-year celebration.
